5.text:
Why do inverted nipples smell? Well,
this is a question we're asked quite a lot

9.text:
by our patients. The reason is in normal showering
and washing, we wash away the natural secretions

16.text:
that the skin builds up during the day. However,
because inverted nipples are inwards, we are

21.text:
not able to wash them, clean them effectively,
and it's this build-up of the skin fluids,

27.text:
the natural skin fluids, which cause the odour
that you can sometimes get from inverted nipples.

33.text:
Often when we correct inverted nipples, we
see remnants of the skin residue, which we'll

38.text:
clean off during the procedure. After your
inverted nipple surgery, the nipples will

44.text:
be out permanently, and they'll be able to
be washed in the normal way and won't build

50.text:
up this skin secretions and smell. If you'd
like to find out more about the technique

55.text:
we use, other information about inverted nipples,
including testimonials of people who've had

60.text:
the surgery, please click on the link below
in the description. This will take you to

65.text:
our website where you'll be able to find out
lots more information about inverted nipples.
